snippet: The Americans and at least one Afghan soldier were killed when a coalition aircraft accidentally struck their position, Afghan and American officials said Tuesday.
abstract: Five American service members and at least one Afghan soldier are killed in friendly fire airstrike in Afghanistan; investigators are looking into possible causes, including faulty coordinates or other human error.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, Afghanistan, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Americans and at least one Afghan soldier were killed when a coalition aircraft accidentally struck their position, Afghan and American officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: ‘Friendly Fire’ Strike Kills 5 Special Operations Soldiers in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: ‘Friendly Fire’ Strike Kills 5 Special Operations Soldiers in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
